Probably should have taken with the P. Precarious position for the Q.
moves.7. d4 Be7 8. Bd3 c5 9. Nf3 h6 10. O-O Bd: Having trouble developing my queenside. Should have considered e5 before he castled.
moves.12... Qd8: Qe7 would have added potency to Re1. Besides, I get to form a battery with my next move.
moves.13. Qf3: He is taking a long time to move at this stage.
moves.13... Qc7 14. d5 h5: Especially on this move. I was expecting Qh3.
moves.15. Ne3 Bxh2+: Fritz says White is clearly better here. I didn't think so at the time, but was soon to find out otherwise.
moves.16. Kh1 Be5 17. Rb1: A stunner. My plans have been laid waste.
moves.17... Bxc3 18. dxe6: Fritz says White is won here, regardless of what I play. I did not take with the B because I wanted to keep the N out of f5 and d5, and I thought I would need to B on c6.
moves.18... fxe6 19. Bg6+ Kd8: This was the plan. Now the K protects the Q in the event of a big tradeoff. Yes, I know it's a big risk.
